name: example
description: Example project voor the mithril-contenteditable library.

scripts.build:domain: npm run clean && parcel build index.html --out-dir ../../docs --public-url https://erikvullings.github.io/mithril-contenteditable && cp favicon.ico ../../docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build index.html
